body.name: Wagner Stern WHITEN+ Edition. Smart Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor. 5 Brushing Modes and 3 Intensity Levels, 8 Dupont Bristles, Premium Travel Case.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 1 min
Or fastest pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 1 min
features: EXCELLENT CRAFTSMANSHIP: Our premium electric toothbrush features a damage prevention design to prevent rolling and falling, unlike most electric toothbrushes that get damaged when they roll off the counter. This addition will prolong your toothbrush lifetime.

15 CLEANING OPTIONS: This Wagner electric toothbrush has a frequency vibration 48,000 VPM levitating motor to ensure a deep, thorough, and effective tooth brushing experience. It has 5 cleaning modes and 3 levels of intensity. In addition, the electric toothbrush has a built-in pressure sensor to protect your teeth and gums from damage. This combination allows you to choose from any of the 15 cleaning options.

EASY TO CLEAN: Our Smart Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor comes with 8 soft DuPont brush heads. We have made a smart timer into the toothbrush to keep teeth and gums protected and soothed. Professional dental recommendations of 2 minutes brushing time with 30 seconds interval reminders are included to ensure the proper gum health. We recommend changing the brush head every 3 months. Replacement brush heads are also available on Amazon.

WHITEN+ TECHNOLOGY: 100% dentist-approved, this electric toothbrush has 2 whitening modes. Wagner toothbrush removes up to 10 times more plaque than a manual toothbrush. As a result, it begins to whiten teeth in less than 1-week, and it improves gum health in less than 2-weeks. Please switch whitening modes for every cleaning to achieve the best whitening result. For best whitening result we recommend to use ORALBLISS whitening gel.

LONG BATTERY LIFE: Our electric toothbrush with pressure sensor has an incredible battery life with USB wireless charging. You can carry the non-slip electric toothbrush anywhere or leave it at home. Our advanced Lithium-Ion battery is known for its long lifetime and will hold a charge for up to 30 days. We also offer a 1-year replacement warranty.

Perfect Gift Idea. Are you looking for a perfect gift idea for your family, relatives, or friends? This premium electric toothbrush with a pressure sensor is made to impress. It is reliable and effective. You can surprise a loved one on anniversaries, Christmas day, birthdays, Thanksgiving, among other special events. Portable Travel Case. This classic and unique toothbrush set is equipped with a portable travel case, making it convenient to store your toothbrush and take it with you on the go. Toothbrush comes with 8 brush heads engineered by world famous DuPont a world leader in quality & materials science. Dentists recomend to change brush heads every 3 months so 8 will last for over 2 years. The electric toothbrush kit is dustproof, waterproof, and easy to store. It is a perfect hassle-free travel toothbrush option

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product is beautiful and seems well made. The head of the brush is small which was my only concern when ordering. However, my teeth feel considerably more clean than with a Colgate battery operated brush. This brush does the job well. I charged it last week and haven't had to recharge again yet. Really great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this toothbrush! I bought several for family members including myself. Easy to charge and last! I usually charge it once a month! Very efficient cleaning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just got it yesterday, so I’ve only used it twice. So far, it meets my expectations. I love that it’s rechargeable and comes with extra brush heads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great toothbrush for the money
reviews.reviewText: The tooth brush really deserves 5 stars but I gave it 4 for personal reasons and thats that I would like harder brissels on the toothbrush heads but see that is just me some people like softer. Also the case is a little flimsy . Other then that this toothbrush is really really nice. I charged it once and id say 8-10 brushes later and its still on full battery life. The color is really cool the blue and gold look really nice like way nicer then the Panasonic one I had that was just white and green. The feel is heavy and the toothbrush really is the same as the Panasonic which I paid almost 100 dollars for. It came with a bunch of heads which is great that I dont have to buy them for a while. I wish the case was nicer but I mean cmon im really being greedy wanting a nice case for 38 dollars I got so much with this toothbrush. Overall im really happy ill probably get a few as Christmas gifts for people because I feel like it will make a great gift and you cant go wrong with the price . I like the 2 minute timer it has because it keeps me in check cause without a timer ill dangerously brush my teeth for way too long and that can make them worse by removing importantly needed natural coatings on your teeth . It really buzzes fast and does a good job on making your mouth feel clean when your done brushing . If my opinion means anything which really it dont lol but if it does to anyone I definitely recommend this and can say its a good buy for the money .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My teeth have never felt cleaner!
reviews.reviewText: Love this! It fits great in your hand. Play around with it first, before using it. It’s tricky to navigate the bottom part of the toothbrush but you do that by pressing the power button several times. The area will light up showing you what level you’re on such as sensitive, massage or whitening (not to sure on whitening, only time will tell). Also, you don’t have to use a lot of toothpaste and it cleans your teeth quickly. Be careful not to get it too close to your gums because it can/and will irritate them. The best purchase for your teeth!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this tooth brush
reviews.reviewText: I got this brush about a month ago and so far am pleased! I also had a cleaning with my dentist who said there was no plaque when i showed up for my appointment from my at home brushing! Its easy to use, lightweight, cost effective and looks great on the counter! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plenty of power and brushing styles!
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush is the best I’ve tried so far, and I’ve tried about 5 different electric toothbrushes over the past few years. My last toothbrush was a sore disappointment, partly my own fault. My wife loves very soft bristles, and has sensitive teeth/gums, and she loved it, so I thought I’d give it a try. It barely felt like my teeth were getting cleaned, even after scrubbing them while the tooth brush was trying to clean. THIS tooth brush on the other hand has PLENTY of power. I use it on the most powerful setting and I ALMOST want to use the next setting down. My teeth feel like I just got them polished at the dentist’s office and I don’t have to press hard or scrub to get them feeling that way! The toothbrush head is smaller than a normal toothbrush head, and at first that was weird, but in less than a week I got used to it, and now I like it because it’s easier to maneuver around and get everywhere clean. Also, I tested out the safety feature where it cuts out if you press too hard. I feel like it worked perfectly. I was able to get it to trigger without have to put a ton of pressure on it, but I can still put enough pressure to where if I needed to do some scrubbing, I would be able to just fine. And it doesn’t completely shut the toothbrush off like I thought it would. It just cuts off the vibration while it’s being pressed, and as soon as you release the pressure, it continues brushing.The only thing I’m not a huge fan of, but again I’m already starting to get used to, is the handle is a bit larger than most electric tooth brushes I’ve used. But it’s not cumbersome or anything, so not a huge deal.Overall, I am very happy with this toothbrush and it’s been one of the better purchases I’ve made recently! Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Powerful
reviews.reviewText: I couldn’t wait to write a review on this amazing tooth brush. I purchased different colors for my family and when I tell you their exquisite. Stylist and just gorgeous. Now to the power. I felt like I just came from a professional dental cleaning. It actually was too powerful but the great thing is you can adjust it to what you can handle. I’d rather a strong powerful product than a weak one. If you ran out of floss no worries, this toothbrush flicked out everything. A must have if you’re looking for this type of toothbrush . I would absolutely recommend. PS still don’t forget to floss😊

Los materiales se sienten de buena calidad, cuando lo recibí lo cargue para que estuviera al 100% tardo 2-3 horas, el empaque dice que una vez cargado durará 1 mes, de momento solo he usado la velocidad 1 de 3 porque si se siente la diferencia en el movimiento del cepillo, desde el primer uso deja una sensación de limpieza profunda en los dientes, hasta el momento he usado los modos limpieza y blanqueamiento.Punto adicional es que al traer 8 cabezales y si la recomendación de uso por cada uno es de 3 meses, quiere decir que durará 2 años, lo cual ya que es un costo-beneficio.En mi experiencia personal, yo tuve un poco de sensibilidad los primeros días de uso.El único punto que si bien no va en función del cepillo, mas si del estuche, es que no cierra bien ya que al parecer al empacarlo forzaron la entrada de los cabezales y se descuadro, pero no es un inconveniente.
Love brushing my teeth with this toothbrush! It has power and love the model. Very happy with it. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seems to do a much better job of cleaning than the oral b type, which is generally the only one you can get in the shops and it's no different regardless of the version, this head shape allows you to get into gaps and hard to reach bits alot better.Great to have a battery that lasts about a month, and with usb charger as well it's much more convenient.Nice build quality, many operation modes and a strength selector, not sure they do what they say but gives some variance so you can use it as you like.Also nice case and lots of replacement heads.Genuinely my teeth feel and look cleaner since using this, the only downside is the vibration feeling is a more unpleasant if you touch your teeth with the plastic of the brush. As you get used to the shape it becomes easier to wield and you can put it on softer setting while you get used to it.
This brush is great to use, cleans well and the small brush head helps to avoid gum damage. The seller was very responsive and nice.

The product is well made and the design is nice but functionality is not the best. You have to consciously hold the toothbrush such that you do not accidentally switch it off when brushing your teeth.
